replies.author: liu00
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-11-7 16:56
http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/dragonfly/ ←站内搬运贴不存在了
我推荐另外一个相似的插件
http:/ ...
DragonFly.* - All Permissions
DragonFly.DismissYou - Dismiss your dragon
DragonFly.DismissOthers - Dismiss other players dragon
DragonFly.DismissAll - Dismiss all dragons
DragonFly.MountYou - Mount your dragons
DragonFly.MountOthers - Force Player Mount dragon

需要给玩家那个权限
